Definition: Seeing the headline_a and headline_b, one must decide if these 2 tasks are on the covering the same scenario

Positive Examples.input: headline_a: Equifax CEO Richard Smith Resigns After Uproar Over Massive hack. headline_b: Equifax's Interim CEO brings Charm, Focus on
Positive Examples.explanation: Here we can see both the article headlines talk on Equifax CEO and what he has done

Positive Examples.input: headline_a: Ivory Coast:Gunfire erupts at army talks. headline_b: Heavy gunfire in Ivory Coast as government in talks with mutinying soldiers
Positive Examples.explanation: Here we can see both the article headlines talk on Ivory Coast gunfire and soldiers

Negative Examples.input: headline_a: Hackers steal data of 143 million in US from Equifax. headline_b: Equifax says it won't bar consumers from joining breach-related lawsuits
Negative Examples.explanation: Here we can see both the article headlines talk on about data breach and the other talks about the lawsuits

Negative Examples.input: headline_a: Justice Dept. charge China-backed hackers over Equifax breach. headline_b: U.S. Charge Chinese Military Officers in 2017 Equifax Hacking
Negative Examples.explanation: Here we can see both the article headlines talk about the charges placed on the hackers on the same data breach
